paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The TTR mutation Val30Met presented in 14 of the 23 patients (61%)

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with TTR-FAP, leading to amyloid fibril accumulation.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families with TTR-FAP.
variants.population_frequency: Estimated prevalence of TTR mutations responsible for TTR-FAP is 1:100,000 in Europe.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and mutation frequency.
variants.additional_notes: The study included a cohort of patients with confirmed TTR mutations.
key_quotes: The TTR mutation Val30Met presented in 14 of the 23 patients (61%)
Patients with TTR-FAP had paresis of the finger and thumb muscles.
